mapper.select:
/* getManagerInfo */ SELECT (SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1) AS TEAM_MNG_SEQ,
(SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1) AS TEAM_MNG_NAME,
IFNULL((SELECT 'Y' FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1), 'N') AS TEAM_MNG_CK,
(SELECT A.EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1) AS TEAM_TMP_MNG_SEQ,
(SELECT A.EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1) AS TEAM_TMP_MNG_NAME,
IFNULL((SELECT 'Y' FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (4, 5, 6) limit 1), 'N') AS TEAM_TMP_MNG_CK,
(SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND DEPT_LEVEL = 2) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1) AS DEPT_MNG_SEQ,
(SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND DEPT_LEVEL = 2) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1) AS DEPT_MNG_NAME,
IFNULL((SELECT 'Y' FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND DEPT_LEVEL = 2) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1), 'N') AS DEPT_MNG_CK,
(SELECT A.EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1) AS DEPT_TMP_MNG_SEQ,
(SELECT A.EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1) AS DEPT_TMP_MNG_NAME,
IFNULL((SELECT 'Y' FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_TMP_DUTY B ON A.EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ AND B.ACTIVE = 'Y' WHERE TMP_DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}) AND (DIVISION = 0 OR (DIVISION = 4 AND DIVISION_SUB != 3)) AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND B.TMP_DUTY_SN IN (2, 3, 7) limit 1), 'N') AS DEPT_TMP_MNG_CK,
(SELECT EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (1)) AS GRAND_MNG_SEQ,
(SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (1)) AS GRAND_MNG_NAME,
IFNULL((SELECT 'Y' FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND DUTY_CODE IN (1)), 'N') AS GRAND_MNG_CK
/* getTempMngInfo */ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
/* getIdCheck */ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}

/* getEmpSelList */ SELECT HEI.EMP_SEQ, HEI.ERP_EMP_SEQ, CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO DI WHERE HDI.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ = DI.DEPT_SEQ) ELSE HEI.DEPT_SEQ END AS DEPT_SEQ, CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO DI WHERE HDI.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ = DI.DEPT_SEQ) ELSE HEI.DEPT_NAME END AS DEPT_NAME, CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN HEI.DEPT_SEQ ELSE "" END AS TEAM_SEQ, CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN HEI.DEPT_NAME ELSE "" END AS TEAM_NAME, HEI.EMP_NAME_KR, IFNULL(HEI.POSITION_CODE, "") AS POSITION_CODE, HEI.POSITION_NAME, HEI.GRADE_NAME, IFNULL(HEI.DUTY_CODE, "") AS DUTY_CODE, HEI.DUTY_NAME, HEI.JOB_DETAIL FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO HDI ON HEI.DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND HEI.EMP_SEQ IN (${userList})
mapper.update:
/* setUserInfoUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO SET
DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = (CASE WHEN #{afTeamName} = '' THEN #{afDeptName} ELSE #{afTeamName} END),
DEPT_TEAM_NAME = #{afTeamName},
POSITION_CODE = #{afPositionCode}, POSITION_NAME = IFNULL(#{position}, ""), GRADE_NAME = #{afGradeName},
DUTY_CODE = #{afDutyCode}, DUTY_NAME = IFNULL(#{afDutyName}, ""),
DUTY_CODE = IFNULL(#{afDutyCode},""), DUTY_NAME = IFNULL(#{afDutyName}, ""),
JOB_DETAIL = #{afJobDetail},
EMP_SEQ = #{hisEmpSeq} WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{hisEmpSeq}
mapper.select: /* getUserPersonnelOne */ SELECT a.EMP_SEQ, a.ERP_EMP_SEQ, a.LOGIN_ID, a.LOGIN_PASSWD, a.EMP_NAME_KR, a.EMP_NAME_EN, a.EMP_NAME_CN, a.ATT_CARD_NUM, a.DEPT_SEQ, CAM_HR.FN_GetName('DEPT', a.DEPT_SEQ, 'KR') AS DEPT_NAME, a.DEPT_TEAM_NAME, a.OCCUPATION_CODE, a.POSITION_CODE, a.POSITION_NAME, a.DUTY_CODE, a.DUTY_NAME, a.GRADE_CODE, a.GRADE_NAME, a.POSITION_OR_DUTY, a.EMPLOY_GUBUN, a.JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(a.JOIN_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY_F, a.APPOINT_DAY, a.APPOINT_GUBUN, a.APPOINT_GUBUN_DETAIL, a.CTR_ST_DAY, a.CTR_EN_DAY, a.WEEK_WORK_TIME_TYPE, a.WEEK_WORK_TIME, a.BF_APPOINT_DAY, a.LOCAL_TALENT, a.WORK_FIELD_NAME, a.ZIP_CODE, a.ADDR, a.OLD_ADDR, a.ADDR_DETAIL, a.ADDR_REFERENCES, a.LEGAL_DOMICILE, a.HOME_TEL_NUM, a.MOBILE_TEL_NUM, a.OFFICE_TEL_NUM, a.EMAIL_ADDR, a.BDAY, a.GENDER_CODE, a.WEDDING_ACTIVE, a.IMPAIR_LEVEL_CODE, a.DEGREE_CODE, a.JOB_DETAIL, a.SPEC_CODE, a.DIV_FACTION, a.WORK_STATUS_CODE, a.RESIGN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(a.RESIGN_DAY,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RESIGN_DAY_F, a.RESIGN_REASON, a.PHOTO_FILE_ID, a.DEPT_MG_YN, a.ADMIN_APPROVE_YN, a.SECRET_YN, a.SEC_AUTHORIZE_DATE, a.SEC_RELEASE_DATE, a.ACTIVE, a.REG_EMP_SEQ, a.REG_DATE, a.MOD_EMP_SEQ, a.MOD_DATE, a.RES_REGIS_NUM, a.CHECK_PASSWD, a.CAPS_NUM, a.HOME_PAGE_ACTIVE, a.BEFOR_CAREER, a.BS_ELAPSED_YEAR, a.ELAPSED_YEAR, a.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, a.BANK_NAME, a.ACCOUNT_NUM, a.DUZON_CODE, a.CAR_ACTIVE, a.CAR_NUM, a.EMG_TEL_NUM, a.BLOOD_TYPE, a.WEDDING_DAY, a.HOBBY, a.SPECIALITY, a.RELIGION, a.HEIGHT, a.WEIGHT, a.VISIONL, a.VISIONR, a.DIVISION, a.DIVISION_SUB, (select dept_name from cam_hr.dj_dept_info where dept_seq = (select parent_dept_seq from cam_hr.dj_dept_info where dept_seq= a.DEPT_SEQ)) PARENT_DEPT_NAME, (select parent_dept_seq from cam_hr.dj_dept_info where dept_seq= a.DEPT_SEQ) AS DEPT_PARENT_SEQ, b.picFilePath FROM cam_hr.dj_emp_info AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IM.ID_IMAGE_PK, CONCAT(FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_UUID) AS picFilePath, IM.EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_IMAGE_MANAGE IM LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI ON FI.FILE_NO = IM.ID_IMAGE_PK )b on a.EMP_SEQ = b.EMP_SEQ WHERE a.EMP_SEQ = #{pk};
/* getUserImageInfo */ SELECT IM.IMAGE_ID, IM.EMP_SEQ, IM.SIGN_IMAGE_PK, IM.SIGN2_IMAGE_PK, IM.ID_IMAGE_PK, IM.PERSONAL_IMAGE_PK FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_IMAGE_MANAGE IM WHERE IM.EMP_SEQ = #{pk}
mapper.insert:
/* setHistoryInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ORGANIZATION_HISTORY ( HISTORY_TITLE, HISTORY_CONTENT, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{historyTitle}, #{historyContent}, #{regEmpSeq}, NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: /* getHistoryList */ SELECT H.HISTORY_SN, H.HISTORY_TITLE, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ=H.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS regEmpName, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(H.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d")) AS REG_DT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ORGANIZATION_HISTORY H WHERE 1=1 AND H.ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY H.HISTORY_SN DESC

/* getHistoryOne */ SELECT H.HISTORY_SN, H.HISTORY_TITLE, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ=H.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS regEmpName, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(H.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d")) AS REG_DT, H.HISTORY_CONTENT FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ORGANIZATION_HISTORY H WHERE 1=1 AND H.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND H.HISTORY_SN = #{historySn}
/* getHistoryFileInfo */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE file_cd = 'user' AND FR_KEY = #{historySn}

/* getUserEncryptionList */
SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE LENGTH(LOGIN_PASSWD) < 25
/* getUserInfoToId */ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{id}
